mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents (concd,title,regidate,updatedate) SELECT #{concd},#{title},now(),now() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM contents WHERE concd=#{concd})
INSERT INTO contents_movie (concd,regidate,updatedate) SELECT #{concd},now(),now() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM contents_movie WHERE concd=#{concd})
INSERT INTO contents_book (concd,regidate,updatedate) SELECT #{concd},now(),now() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM contents_book WHERE concd=#{concd})
mapper.update: update contents_movie set cgvmg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=(select concd from contents where concd like 'M%' and title= #{title});
update contents_movie set lottemg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=(select concd from contents where concd like 'M%' and title= #{title});
update contents_movie set megaBoxmg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=(select concd from contents where concd like 'M%' and title= #{title});
update contents_book set yesbg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=(select concd from contents where concd like 'B%' and title= #{title});
update contents_book set naverbg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=#{concd};
update contents_book set bandibg =#{grade},updatedate=now() where concd=(select concd from contents where concd like 'B%' and title= #{title});
